extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utilities for strings.

        public static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Exception e)

        This is convenient for print the exception to any stream.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • containsIgnoreCase

        public static boolean containsIgnoreCase(java.lang.String outer,
                                         java.lang.String inner)
        Returns whether a string contains another string without evaluating the case of those.
        Parameters:
        outer - the outer string
        inner - the inner string which must be contained inside the outer
        Returns:
        whether the outer string contains the inner string, case insensitive

      • toEmptyIfNull

        public static java.lang.String toEmptyIfNull(java.lang.String s)
        Returns the given string if it is not null or an empty string if it is null.
        Parameters:
        s - a string
        Returns:
        the string or "" if it is null

      • ensureTrailing

        public static java.lang.String ensureTrailing(java.lang.String string,
                                              java.lang.String trailing)
        Ensures that the given strings ends with the given trailing pattern.

        The string is returned unchanged if it already ends with the trailing pattern. A new string that is the concatenation of the base string with the trailing pattern is returned otherwise.

        Parameters:
        string - the string
        trailing - the trailing pattern
        Returns:
        a string that ends with the given pattern
